body: What happens when you try to do `int(True)`, `float(True)`, and `bool(5)`, etc.? We should have tests for these and add any missing conversions.
body_html: What happens when you try to do int(True), float(True), and bool(5), etc.? We should have tests for these and add any missing conversions.
body_text: What happens when you try to do int(True), float(True), and bool(5), etc.? We should have tests for these and add any missing conversions.
